channel.title: [317]-[delta]-Problem, help fast
channel.description:
So my laptop broke about 3 months ago, so I was working on my desktop ever sense. I just got my laptop back a couple days ago and I had to install java my self along with a couple other program files.
When I go to run my server this shows up in the prompt: [code]' java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file.[/code]
And this is my run code: [code]@echo off cd Bin java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server exit[/code]
I have the newest JRE and JDK.

item.title: [317]-[delta]-Problem, help fast
item.dc:creator: @mrpyro3 mrpyro3
item.description:
@mrpyro3 wrote:

i’ll dumb it down, set your environmental variables

Read full topic

@stefano1911 wrote:

If you’re sure you have installed Java ensure the Java executable is in your system’s path
